subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Amado Guevara scored three goals, two on penalty kicks, as the Red Bulls defeated the Kansas City Wizards, 3-2, on Saturday night to make the Major League Soccer playoffs.
snippet: Amado Guevara scored three goals, two on penalty kicks, as the Red Bulls defeated the Kansas City Wizards, 3-2, on Saturday night to make the Major League Soccer playoffs.
